bug.author: GisTom2
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h5>System information (version)</denchmark-h>
OpenCV => na Operating System / Platform => na Compiler => na
<denchmark-h:h5>Detailed description</denchmark-h>
The page <denchmark-link:https://github.com/opencv/opencv/wiki>https://github.com/opencv/opencv/wiki</denchmark-link> has a link to the Cheatsheet <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/opencv_cheatsheet.pdf>http://docs.opencv.org/opencv_cheatsheet.pdf</denchmark-link>
But the link <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/opencv_cheatsheet.pdf>http://docs.opencv.org/opencv_cheatsheet.pdf</denchmark-link> is broken. Not Found The requested URL /opencv_cheatsheet.pdf was not found on this server. <denchmark-h:h5>Steps to reproduce</denchmark-h>
Click <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/opencv_cheatsheet.pdf>http://docs.opencv.org/opencv_cheatsheet.pdf</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: You need to provide Build Version to access the cs. <denchmark-link:http://docs.opencv.org/2.4/opencv_cheatsheet.pdf>http://docs.opencv.org/2.4/opencv_cheatsheet.pdf</denchmark-link>
